author: dklco
msg: Adding basic HTML encoding as per SLING-3665

author: hdu
msg: #i125145# build helpcontent only for enabled languages
and treat AOO's default language "en-US" as always enabled to allow that
languages with only partial translations for helpcontent can be used by
falling back to the default language for not yet translated parts.

author: bdelacretaz
msg: Release Apache Sling Scripting JavaScript Support 2.0.14

author: stsp
msg: Switch FSFS' create_rep_state() function to the dual-pool paradigm.
Make some callers pass a scratch pool to reduce memory overhead.
use a scratch pool for data not returned to the caller.
loops and pass it as scratch pool to create_rep_state().
